turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello. how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello? are you there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I'm here. Can you hear me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Let's get an order started from Bella Luna Pizza if you would.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure. what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: We're going to get four large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it and what toppings did you want on those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You know the first which is kind of classic cuz everybody likes that and for the second one let's get a mushroom pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And the third one, I want a Hawaiian combo.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And on the last one make that a sausage and bell pepper.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just a regular pepperoni.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. for the first, what do you mean by classic?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thanks for clarifying. so u want 4 large pizzas, 1 pepperoni, 1 mushroom pizza, 1 hawaiian combo, and 1 sausage and bell pepper pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Can you make sure those are thick-crust pizzas too? I want to make sure we get our money's worth.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure thing. thick crust pizza it is.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cool.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total for that is $72.19.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, place the order and how long do you think that will take?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. i've placed your order for pick up. it'll take 25 mins to be baked.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I think that's all we needed today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, take care. enjoy those thick crust pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cool, thanks so much.

items.name: And on the last one make
